name: ListeriosisTestsForListeriaSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Listeriosis (Tests for Listeria species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Listeria species.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Listeria culture/ isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC system = Milk, Cheese)
